title: INtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Facebook will soon roll out support for passkeys on Android and iOS
items.description: Passkey logins make it harder for bad actors to remotely access your accounts because they require physical access to your phone.

items.title: Israel-Tied Predatory Sparrow Hackers Are Waging Cyberwar on Iran’s Financial System
items.description: After an attack on Iran’s Sepah bank, the hyper-aggressive Israel-linked hacker group has now destroyed more than $90 million held at Iranian crypto e...

items.title: xAI is facing a lawsuit for operating over 400 MW of gas turbines without permits
items.description: The Colossus data center was allegedly operating as many as 35 gas turbines without pollution controls in a region that already had poor air quality.

items.title: Waymo has set its robotaxi sights on NYC
items.description: Waymo said it's working on a return to New York City and its first step it applying for a permit.

items.title: A glitch is turning Threads into a literal echo chamber
items.description: A Threads glitch is making it look like everyone on your feed is saying the same thing.

items.title: US Supreme Court Upholds Tennessee’s Ban on Gender-Affirming Care for Minors

items.title: OpenAI found features in AI models that correspond to different ‘personas’
items.description: OpenAI researchers say they’ve discovered hidden features inside AI models that correspond to misaligned “personas,” according to new research publish...

items.title: The Best 2 Home Slushie Machines of 2025
items.description: The Ninja Slushi is not the only slushie machine. There is another.

items.title: 6 Best Red Light Therapy Masks and LED Devices of 2025, Reviewed
items.description: Your face called—it’s low-key offended you trust TikTok more than WIRED.
